mapper.sql: regiondtlid, regionid, mediatype, mediaid, duration, raw, direction, speed, color, size, opacity, sequence, uri, fromdate, todate
mapper.select: select * from regiondtl where regionid = #{regionid} order by sequence
select * from regiondtl where regionid in (select regionid from region where layoutid = #{layoutid}) order by regiondtlid
mapper.delete: delete from regiondtl where regionid in (select regionid from region where layoutid = #{layoutid})
mapper.insert:
insert into regiondtl(regionid, mediatype, mediaid, duration, raw, direction, speed, color, size, opacity, sequence, uri, fromdate, todate) values
(#{item.regionid}, #{item.mediatype}, #{item.mediaid}, #{item.duration}, #{item.raw}, #{item.direction}, #{item.speed}, #{item.color}, #{item.size}, #{item.opacity}, #{item.sequence}, #{item.uri}, #{item.fromdate}, #{item.todate})

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into regiondtl (regionid, mediatype, mediaid, duration, raw, direction, speed, color, size, opacity, sequence, uri, fromdate, todate) values (#{regionid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mediatype,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{mediaid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{raw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{direction,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{speed,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{opacity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fromdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{todate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

update regiondtl
regionid = #{regionid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
